title: Arctic LTER Weather Stations
text:
Current Weather Data from LTER Weather Stations
Note: These data are provisional and have not been error-checked. The weather stationâ€™s time is set to Alaska Standard Time and is not adjusted for Daylight Saving Time. Data are hourly or half-hourly averages.


For current Toolik Field Station data, follow the links below.
